column4: Shalom y'all. Both my network card and my sound card seem to have stopped working. What to do?
How can I re configure my network card so that it will recognize the router?
Does anyone have any suggestions about reconfiguring my network card?
Just point me in the right direction
you might want to look into ifconfig and iwconfig.
but that's after you're sure the drivers for your network card are working properly.
